content.headingContent: THE NEW OLYMPUS 5 HIKE LOW GTX
content.subheadingContent: STAY DRY. STAY COMFORTABLE. STAY OUT THERE.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: The versatile new Olympus 5 Hike Low GTX is your perfect trail companion, with waterproof GORE-TEX product technology to protect you from the elements and max cushion for premium comfort.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
KEEP COMFORT IN AND WATER OUT.

Wet or muddy trails are no match for waterproof GORE-TEX product technology, which is guaranteed by GORE-TEX to allow moisture to escape in any season, in any weather. Dry feet are the best way to enjoy all-day, all-weather adventures and the new Olympus 5 Hike Low GTX has what it takes to keep you hiking comfortably, no matter the adventure.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: LOCK IN AND HEAD OUT. Premium collar design provides a tailored locked-in feel for maximum responsiveness and balance. Stay out there and keep moving for miles while your shoes stay put.

image.alt: Olympus 5 Hike Low GTX in Action

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
MAXIMUM GRIP FOR MAXIMUM ADVENTURE.

Hug the trails with VibramÂ® MegaGripâ„¢. According to VibramÂ®, this high-performance sticky rubber offers unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces. Maintain optimal ground adaptability on dirt, rocks, or whatever else the trail throws at you.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: THE ROOM YOU NEED FOR ALL-DAY FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT. With our Original FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, you have the space you need to conquer the dirt. This fit gives your feet room in the toe box to spread out naturally and comfortably so you can keep running and discovering all day long.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: STAY DRY. STAY COMFORTABLE. STAY OUT THERE.
